Detail - Contractor to provide a sample panel (1000 x1000mm) of the exposed aggregate specified finish before commencing work

Mix design to be confirmed by the Engineer

Detail - Riverstone from a selected local quarry, with a diameter of 150-250mm, will be set into the concrete. The stones must be embedded at least half their height into the concrete for stability. Place the stones closely, ensuring gaps between them do not exceed 50mm.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - The protruding portion of the stone to be 50-75mm above the finish concrete level.
Verifying Document - Riverstone delivery docket & photos
Testing Quantity Required (based from schedule qtys) - 150-250mm Riverstone protruding 50-70mm gaps 50mm
